data.title: Meet Turner & Sons Roofing & Siding, LLC Team Middletown, CT
data.meta_description: Meet the Turner & Sons Roofing & Siding, LLC team. Free roofing estimate. Contact us in Middletown CT or call for siding.
data.text:
Doug joined the team in 1998, working side by side with his father. In 2013, Doug became the third generation to own and operate Turner & Sons Roofing & Siding, LLC. He is responsible for all roofing sales while assisting in siding, windows, gutters, and doors. Doug oversees all employees as well as operations and financial accounts for the business.

Personal interest: "I love my job and take great pride in our company. However, when not at work, I enjoy spending my time with my wife, two daughters, and our three labs. We love to ski, snowmobile, enjoy the outdoors, and the attending the girls' sporting events.”

John has been an owner of Turner & Sons Roofing & Siding, LLC since 1979. John does the majority of our siding and window estimates, assists with repairs and troubleshooting issues, and provides good quality solutions in our customer service department.

Personal Interest: "I choose to stay active by participating in outdoor activities. However, my favorite activity is skiing with my grandchildren."

Anthony is a seasoned professional known for his expertise in project management across diverse industries. Anthony's commitment to excellence is evident in his hands-on approach to project management. He collaborates closely with team members and clients to foster clear communication and address any obstacles that may arise along the way.

His in-depth knowledge and techniques and best practices allows him to offer expert advice and solutions that meet the unique needs of clients. Anthony prioritizes understanding clients’ specific roofing and siding needs and preferences, offering tailored solutions and unparalleled service to exceed expectations. His adept communication skills and ability to build lasting relationships contribute significantly to the company’s reputation for beauty, quality and responsibility.

Personal Interest: Anthony treasures moments spent with his dogs and cherishes quality time with his family above all else. When time permits, he indulges in outdoor pursuits such as hunting and fishing, ATV’s, and Snowmobiling.

Craig brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his role as Project Manager at Turner & Sons, LLC.. With a robust background spanning multiple facets of the construction industry, Craig's journey to his current position is marked by a dedication to excellence and a passion for delivering top-tier results.

Craig leverages his diverse background to oversee the successful execution of windows, doors, roofing and siding projects. He is committed to delivering excellence in craftsmanship, ensuring client satisfaction at every stage of the project. His leadership and attention to detail are instrumental in driving the company's reputation for quality and reliability.

Personal Interest: Snowmobiling through the winter landscapes and tackling rugged trails on his mountain bike during the warmer months. Craig's love for adventure is matched only by his devotion to his family, including his two beloved dogs. Whether exploring the great outdoors or spending quality time at home.

John is the cornerstone of production management at Turner & Sons Roofing & Siding, LLC, serving as the Production Manager with unwavering dedication and expertise. With his keen eye for detail and extensive experience in project oversight, John ensures that every project is executed with precision and excellence, from start to finish.

With a wealth of experience in the construction industry, John is well-versed in problem-solving and adept at addressing challenges as they arise. His ability to think on his feet and implement innovative solutions ensures that projects stay on track and meet the expectations of clients.

Personal Interest: He has a deep affection for dogs and dedicates his free time to working with dog rescues and fostering dogs in need. His compassion and commitment to animal welfare are evident in his tireless efforts to provide loving homes and second chances to furry friends in distress. John is also passionate about cars, with a keen interest in performance. When not at work, he can often be found tinkering with his own vehicles or attending car shows.

Scott has a comprehensive background in customer service. As a Project Manager at Turner & Sons Roofing and Siding LLC., Scott plays a pivotal role in ensuring the success of every project.

With years of hands-on experience in service and troubleshooting, Scott brings invaluable expertise to the team. His keen eye for detail and technical proficiency enables him to swiftly implement effective solutions, ensuring that projects stay on track and clients are delighted with the results.

In addition to his technical skills, Scott excels in customer service, providing prompt and professional solutions to inquiries and concerns. His ability to communicate clearly and empathetically with clients fosters trust and confidence, laying the foundation for successful long-term relationships.

Personal Interest: Scott is an avid boater, enjoys spending time with his toddler and wife, creating cherished memories together. Their family is completed by their two beloved rescue dogs, who bring endless love and compassion into their home.

Sarah is the heart of the administrative operations at Turner & Sons Roofing & Siding, LLC, serving as the Office Manager with dedication and efficiency. With her meticulous attention to organization, Sarah ensures the smooth functioning of the office, allowing the company to operate seamlessly.

Prior to her role at Turner & Sons, Sarah cultivated her administrative skills through various professional experiences, honing her ability to manage tasks with precision and professionalism. Her background equipped her with the expertise needed to handle the diverse demands of the office environment effectively.

As the Office Manager, Sarah is responsible for overseeing a wide array of administrative tasks, including scheduling your project and client correspondence. Her adeptness in multitasking and problem-solving enables her to address challenges promptly, ensuring that operations run smoothly on a day-to-day basis.

Personal Interest: Sarah enjoys working outdoors, gardening, relishing in hands-on tasks and volunteering within the realm of Equine Assisted Services through PATH Intl. She also shares her home with her husband, horses, cats and dog.
